publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-858.1 Hugh O’Donnell: Government Powers to Ensure Terrestrial Broadcast of Sport—As an amendment to motion (S3M-858) in the name of Keith Brown, leave out from "and considers that" to end. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-858.1 Hugh O’Donnell: Government Powers to Ensure Terrestrial Broadcast of Sport—As an amendment to motion (S3M-858) in the name of Keith Brown, leave out from "and considers that" to end.
